ukernel[0]=0b01001000000000001000000000000000;  // MOV(AAM0) SRF_M BANK
ukernel[1]=0b10010010001000001000000000000000;  // MUL(AAM0) GRF_A BANK SRF_M
ukernel[2]=0b11000000000000001000000000000000;  // SACC(AAM0) BANK BANK
ukernel[3]=0b00010000000001000101000000001111;  // JUMP -2 7
ukernel[4]=0b01001000000000001000000000000000;  // MOV(AAM0) SRF_M BANK
ukernel[5]=0b10010010001000001000000000000000;  // MUL(AAM0) GRF_A BANK SRF_M
ukernel[6]=0b11000000000000001000000000000000;  // SACC(AAM0) BANK BANK
ukernel[7]=0b00010000000001000101000000001111;  // JUMP -2 7
ukernel[8]=0b00100000000000000000000000000000;  // EXIT
